title: Mexico
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,061 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 860L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and Y
description: Mexico is an amazing country, filled with amazing landforms, animals, people, and culture. Students will learn ancient civilizations as well as modern life in Mexico as they read this book. Detailed maps and colorful photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
